docblock.long-description:
$plugin = new Core_Controller_Plugin_Acl();
$plugin->setExcludedResources(array(
    'module_name/controller_name/action_name', // String item representation
    array( // Array item representation
        'module'     => 'module_name',
        'controller' =>'controller_name',
        'action'     => 'action_name'
    )
));

docblock.description: Translate message to specified or automatic locale
docblock.long-description:
Opposite to default Zend_Translate this class aggregates many Zend_Translate objects for module specific translates available

// Manager must be registered previously
$manager = Zend_Registry::get('Zend_Translate');

// Example with auto locale
echo $manager->translate('Untranslated string');

// Example with specified locale
echo $manager->translate('Untranslated string', 'ru');
